Package io.github.utk003.util.data.collection.slice

A package for the custom Slice collection.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Slice<E>
    An array-like object inspired by slices in Go.
    Slice.Transformation<E>
    A FunctionalInterface that represents any element-by-element transformation of a Slice.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSlice<E>
    A template implementation of an array-backed Slice.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SliceIndexOutOfBoundsException
    An exception that is thrown to indicate that a Slice has been accessed with an illegal index.

Package io.github.utk003.util.data.collection.slice Description

A package for the custom Slice collection.

Slices act as simple views into arrays. They are inspired by the slice data type from the programming language Go. For more details on how they work, check the Go language guide or the Slice interface documentation.

See Also:
Slice, https://golang.org
